description.en:
### Monster Smash
1. We're Staying at the Yokai Inn / Otomari wa Youkai-sou e (お泊りは妖界荘へ); Comic Bavel 2018-05
A sinfully lavish feast! ♥
2. Sweating Man and Akaname-san / Asedaku Otoko to Akaname-san (汗だく男とアカナメさん); Comic Bavel 2018-01
Titillating, pure sex with a monster girl! ♥
3. The Office Lady Centaur and Her Little Junior / OL Centaur to Kouhai-kun (OLケンタウロスと後輩君); Comic Bavel 2017-10
"Titillating monster girl sex. ♥" Can you love a quadruped?
4. Her Body is Honest / Karada wa Shoujiki-sha (身体は正直者); Comic Bavel 2017-06
Even demi-humans want pure love!
5. My Sweet Alien Charlotte / Itoshi no Charlotte (愛しの宇宙人); Comic Bavel 2017-04
6. I'm an Oni, but Still a Girl! / Oni dakedo Onnanoko! (鬼だけど女の子！); Comic Bavel 2017-01
Cute story of a guy who plays with a little Oni girl, to her great delight. Things are great, until she gets older and wants to play in other ways.
7. Yokai Hospitality / Ayakashi no Omotenashi (妖のおもてなし); Comic Bavel 2016-08
A traveler meets a monster in a run-down hotel. The monster is meant to kill any humans but doesn't. She treats the human to a small dinner. When the snake woman thought the man was sleeping, he comes from behind and has sex with her.
8. How to Raise Plants / Shokubutsu no Sodatekata (植物の育て方); Comic Bavel 2016-04
Do plants have hearts? ♥
9. How to Raise Mermaids / Ningyo no Kaikata (人魚の飼い方); Comic Bavel 2015-11

Monster Smash (Bakemono Ecchi) is the first book from new-comer Mizone, but it's so good it'll make you toss out your old monster manual and replace it with Monster Smash as your new go-to tome. Collecting nine sweet vanilla monster chapters, Mizone has treated our readers with most delightful dullahans, sultry snake women and cutie centaurs, which I know are all very close to our readers' hearts. These monster girls may look devilish, but they're nothing by pure angels.
description.pt-br: Monster Smash (Bakemono Ecchi) é o primeiro livro do recém-chegado Mizone, mas é tão bom que fará você jogar fora seu antigo manual de monstros e substituí-lo por Monster Smash como seu novo livro de referência. Coletando nove capítulos vanilla de doces garotas monstro, Mizone tratou nossos leitores com os mais encantadores Dullahans, mulheres cobras sensuais e centauras fofas, que eu sei que estão muito próximos dos corações de nossos leitores. Essas garotas monstruosas podem parecer diabólicas, mas não são nada além de anjos puros.
